resources.string: A simple application to inspire you at meal times!
So it\'s time to eat, but you don\'t know what you want!
Choose your meal, click the MEAL ME! button, and a list of delicious options is displayed!
Not enough? Click SHOW ME MORE! for more options
Click any option to display the recipe details
You\'re hungry and you know what you want!
Enter any number of ingredients, click the Meal me button, and a list of delicious options is displayed!
